DOC.brief_title: Physical Emotional Benefits Group Dance Intervention Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose mixed method study evaluate effect 8-week group dance intervention body image posture breast cancer survivor . Program Description : An 8-week dance intervention hold local cancer support center great Philadelphia region . The study run 8 week , class hold week 60 minute . Every class consist 5-10 minute stretch warm lead approximately 50 minute teach light choreography set Bollywood music . Methods : This mixed method study utilize two quantitative assessment qualitative portion comprise initial exit survey . Breast cancer survivor recruit local non-profit cancer support community great Philadelphia region . A sample twelve woman ( n=12 ) fulfil inclusion criterion diagnose treat breast cancer . Dropout rate low , 1 person fit criterion . Informed consent seek obtain University Sciences Philadelphia Institutional Review Board . Procedure : Group dance intervention program last 8 week total control group . All twelve subject participate 60-minute dance session , week 8 week . At begin termination 8 week dance intervention , subject take series assessment include Body Image Scale ( BIS ) , postural assessment use plumbline method , initial exit open-ended survey assess additional benefit program . Analysis : Data review complete Microsoft Excel SOFA Statistics ( version 1.4.6 ) , free statistical analysis program ( available online download www.sofastatistics.com ) . Means mode find demographic use Excel . Qualitative data explore initially read survey note repetitive point . Survey data cod highlight label segment common response survey question . To ensure finding consistent , independent reviewer employ verify cod data . Codes later organize accord similarity develop common theme . Themes find initial exit survey study closer use comparative analysis , look connect theme initial exit survey .
